introduction.p: This control template is for the RibbonIconLabel and the RibbonSmallIconLabel theme. Typically, the title of the control is required to render for RibbonSmallIconLabel, and it is required to not render for RibbonIconLabel, which makes RibbonIconLabel smaller than RibbonSmallIconLabel in size.
When <RibbonIconLabel/> is put inside a <RibbonRibbons/>, the control template of <RibbonIconLabel/> will be changed when space become larger or smaller.
The ContainerComposition property must be set to contain objects, which are typically behind the icon and the title.

prop.name: Image
prop.p: This property defines the icon for the control.
